thread.section_title: Skyline Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Ticks most of the boxes
thread.title_full: Ticks most of the boxes - Review of Skyline Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Rob K
title: Ticks most of the boxes
text:
Good location, reasonable price and clean. We enjoyed the rooftop pool every morning where the water was kept quite warm so it's good for recreational use. Very friendly life guard.
The room we stayed had the shared internal door with another room. Our neighbors were loud every night and the walls seemed not very sound proof. Take my advice and if the neighbors are loud just call the front desk - they took care of it (twice) and promptly. Don't get involved in a confrontation by asking politely to be quieter after hours.
Other:
-Free internet in the lobby only.
-Skyline market across the street has reasonable prices on breakfast, coffee, smoothies and more.
-Mexican restaurant in hotel is an ok quality but very expensive. I'd look around next time.
Enjoy NY!
Room Tip: Ask for a room without a shared internal door to the next room. See more room tips
